package.name: Black and White Dynamic Wallpapers
package.shortDescription: Appearance aware wallpapers with a black and white theme for iOS 13. Uses WallpaperLoader by Skitty. Get it from this repo: https://skitty.xyz/repo/

descriptionlist.description: Appearance aware wallpapers with a black and white theme that change with iOS 13 dark mode.

changelog.change: Fixed thumbnail of checkra1n wallpaper and add a second larger logo checkra1n wallpaper
